name: Foldera
overview: Foldera, Inc., a development stage company, provides a free Web-based software system that enables users to work collaboratively in an organized way within a shared electronic workspace in beta version. The company offers Foldera, a secure and easy-to-use software service that instantly and automatically organizes workflow. Foldera combines Web-based email, document manager, task manager, calendar, contact manager, and sharable folders into a unified productivity suite, available with a single login from any Web browser. It also sorts and files userâ€™s sent and incoming email, documents, tasks, and events into folders on a project-by-project basis, chronologically, and in real-time. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Huntington Beach, California.
